dates.title: Project Start
dates.body:
23 Apr

Each date on the timeline indicates a target completion time for a milestone.

dates.title: Vanilla VAE
dates.body:
31 May

Implement a vanilla variational autoencoder, trained on the UTZap50K dataset. Goals: Clear and believable generations, smooth interpolations.

dates.title: KDE Tests
dates.body:
14 Jun

Completed test implementation of kernel density estimation on the latent space. Should provide sufficient evidence whether to follow through with the method, or fall back onto the Attribute2Image timeline.

dates.title: Density Inference
dates.body:
26 Aug

Properly working density functions for each attribute, allowing successful attribute -> latent vector inference. Leaves buffer time to address issues that may arise in tests.

dates.title: User Interface
dates.body:
16 Sep

Design user interface that allows users to generate shoes from attributes, for use in the user study.

dates.title: IRB
dates.body:
30 Sep

Complete IRB, including detailed experiment protocol.

dates.title: User Study
dates.body:
13 Oct

Begin User Study. Aligns with fall semester, which should be a good time for gathering student participants.

dates.title: Results
dates.body:
22 Dec

User studies should be complete, and results should be compiled.

dates.title: Paper
dates.body:
28 Feb

Finish draft of paper about the project, for conference submission.
